metadata.title: Send MDTI Feeds to Anomali ThreatSteeam
metadata.prerequisites: 1)Microsoft Sentinel Log analytics workspace, 2)Enabled Microsoft Defender Threat Intelligence Data Connector, 3)Azure Logic Apps, 4)Microsoft Defender Threat Intelligence API Access and Client App Registered, 5)Anomali ThreatStream API Credentials

metadata.description: Enter value for API Authorization email From Anomali
Enter value for Authorization Key From Anomali
Enter value for ClientID MDTI from Registered App with MDTI API ACCESS
Enter value for ClientSecretMDTI Registered App with MDTI API ACCESS
Enter value for ResourceGroup Where Sentinel Workspace is Deployed pulling in MDTI Feeds
Enter value for ResourceName of the Sentinel Workspace
Enter value for Reputation Scoring for indicators you want to push through

inputs.body:
ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
| where SourceSystem contains "Microsoft Defender Threat Intelligence" or SourceSystem contains"Microsoft Threat Intelligence Analytics"
| where isnotempty(FileHashValue) 
| where TimeGenerated > ago(5min)

ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
| where SourceSystem contains "Microsoft Defender Threat Intelligence" or SourceSystem contains"Microsoft Threat Intelligence Analytics"
| where isnotempty(FileHashValue) 
| where TimeGenerated > ago(5min)

ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
| where SourceSystem contains "Microsoft Defender Threat Intelligence" or SourceSystem contains"Microsoft Threat Intelligence Analytics"
| where isnotempty(DomainName) 
| where TimeGenerated > ago(5min)

ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
| where SourceSystem contains "Microsoft Defender Threat Intelligence" or SourceSystem contains"Microsoft Threat Intelligence Analytics"
| where isnotempty(NetworkSourceIP) 
| where TimeGenerated > ago(5min)

ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
| where SourceSystem contains "Microsoft Defender Threat Intelligence" or SourceSystem contains"Microsoft Threat Intelligence Analytics"
| where isnotempty(Url) 
| where TimeGenerated > ago(5min)
